about_the_game: This sountrack contains all 23 tracks from Zniw Adventure, including the main OST composed by Denis Comtesse, featuring a wide variety of relaxing, mostly acoustic guitar tracks, as well as all minigame chiptunes created by Kamil 'Pator' Patecki and Karolina Twardosz! Both MP3 and high quality FLAC files included!
detailed_description: This sountrack contains all 23 tracks from Zniw Adventure, including the main OST composed by Denis Comtesse, featuring a wide variety of relaxing, mostly acoustic guitar tracks, as well as all minigame chiptunes created by Kamil 'Pator' Patecki and Karolina Twardosz! Both MP3 and high quality FLAC files included!
name: Zniw Adventure Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 113 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 452 MB available space

short_description: A complete official soundtrack from Zniw Adventure, containing all 23 tracks!
